angle.headline: Insider Alert: Security Perimeter Expansion Includes New Tech
angle.angle: I'm hearing whispers that the expanded security perimeter isn't just about physical barriers. New drone detection tech and advanced sensor networks are being deployed to monitor the area. Expect increased surveillance and quicker responses to potential threats.
angle.topic: Super Bowl 60 Security and Emergency Preparedness in the Bay Area
